description:
Designed in the Pacific Northwest, this rainy day classic was tested in some of the world's worst downpours. The shell is fully waterproof and has a brushed lining to manage sweat. The shaped brim directs water away from your head.

  • Waterproof-breathable 3-layer 70-denier GORE-TEX® fabric, seam taped to keep water out
  • Foam stiffened polyurethane-coated brim floats when you drop it in the drink
  • Hook and loop tabs secure the brim
  • Removable chin cord and cordlock
name: Outdoor Research Seattle Rain Hat - Unisex
